message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  Let's see how this goes!
That's a tough start, Alice! I'm willing to be generous, but I need a bigger piece of the pie. How about 65% for me and 35% for you?
Okay, I'll budge a little, but I still want a fair share. 40% for me, 60% for you. This is my final offer.
Alice, your offer is getting better, but time is running out and the value is decreasing. I'll take 70%, you take 30%.  Let's close this deal!
I'm willing to go a little higher, Bob, but I need more than 30%. 35% for me, 65% for you. We can end this here if you agree.
